document_data.name: Thag Slabhead
document_data.mainbody: '''Thag Slabhead''' was a [[ogre]] of the [[Sword Coast North]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: He served [[Vansi Bloodscar]] of the [[Many-Arrows]] [[orc]] kingdom in their occupation of the [[Tower District]] of [[Neverwinter]]. In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, [[Hulgen Proudfist]] asked a [[half-elf]] adventurer to kill Thag to prove their strength when considering whether the [[Proudfist]] tribe should switch sides.
